1283490.name: NOVIS
1283490.description:
NOVIS is a 2D Top-Down Shooter in which the player can't shoot. Instead, you must use your psychic abilities slow time and control your enemies' bullets to send them back!

FEATURES


- Play through handcrafted levels to escape the simulation

- Slow time to dodge and catch bullets out of the air

- Catch bullets and fling them back at your enemies with your mind
1283490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
